original_text: The hand of the Lord was heavy against the people of Ashdod, and he terrified and afflicted them with tumors, both Ashdod and its territory.
korean_text: 여호와의 손이 아스돗 사람에게 엄중히 더하사 독한 종기의 재앙으로 아스돗과 그 지역을 쳐서 망하게 하니

sentences.original_text: The hand of the Lord was heavy against the people of Ashdod
and he terrified and afflicted them with tumors
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 종기로 두렵게 하고 고통을 주었으니
